entries.title: Memo on Slow-Scan Interfaces
entries.summary: A design note on pacing audiovisual systems for meditative interaction.
entries.content:
This essay explores how slow-scan aesthetics reshape attention. It documents the heuristics used to decide when the dotfield exhales, when the GUI breathes, and why latency can read as care.

Includes annotated prototypes, chroma studies, and references to cinematic inspirations.

entries.title: Field Lexicon
entries.summary: Working glossary for collaborators exploring the dotfield ecosystem.
entries.content: An evolving document aligning collaborators on our shared vocabulary: from signal blooms to resonance sweeps. Each term links to captured clips and notes on use in rehearsal.
